summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting an interview with a female victim (name redacted) conducted on August 11, 2020. The victim describes being recruited as a minor by Ghislaine Maxwell to provide massages that escalated into sexual encounters for Jeffrey Epstein and another unidentified man. She also reports recent surveillance and harassment.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Recruited the victim as a minor, arranged for her to give massages to Epstein and another man, was present during encounters, and paid the victim.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The victim had been to his New York and Palm Beach houses many times; massages with him were sexual.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Present for the video conference interview of the victim.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: Present for the video conference interview of the victim.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Present for the video conference interview of the victim.

connections.description: Maxwell recruited girls for Epstein and managed sexual encounters at his properties.
Maxwell recruited the minor victim, instructed her, was present during abuse, and paid her.
The victim provided sexual massages to Epstein while she was a minor.

events.title: FBI Interview of Victim
events.description: A victim is interviewed via video conference by federal prosecutors and law enforcement about her experiences with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Recruitment and Sexual Encounter with 'Bald Man'
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell called the victim, then a minor, to arrange a massage for a 'special friend.' The encounter at Epstein's West Palm Beach house involved a massage that escalated to sexual intercourse. The victim was paid $800.

events.title: Maxwell Fondles Victim
events.description: During a second encounter where the victim was nude in front of Maxwell at Epstein's house, Maxwell fondled the victim's breasts.

events.title: Massage for Second Unidentified Man
events.description: Maxwell arranged for the victim to massage another tall, tan, athletic man. Maxwell instructed the victim to keep her underwear on and not mention her age.

events.title: Recent Surveillance and Harassment
events.description: In the weeks prior to the interview, the victim reports multiple incidents of people photographing/filming her children near her home and a helicopter possibly following her.

locations: New York, New York, United States (Epstein's property)
Church parking lot across from victim's house
keyFacts: A victim, who was a minor at the time, was recruited by Ghislaine Maxwell to provide sexual massages for Jeffrey Epstein and other men.

The victim describes a specific encounter arranged by Maxwell where she was paid $800 for a massage that turned into sexual intercourse with an unidentified 'bald man' at Epstein's West Palm Beach house when she was about 15.
The victim alleges that Ghislaine Maxwell personally fondled her breasts on one occasion at Epstein's house.
The victim reports recent, concerning surveillance of her and her children, including individuals taking pictures and a helicopter possibly following her, suggesting ongoing intimidation.
The victim's initial introduction to Maxwell and Epstein came through her child's biological father and his boyfriend, who was known to law enforcement.
